title: BRIEF-Stellar Capital Partners Repurchases 35.6 Mln Ordinary Shares
text:
BRIEF-Stellar Capital Partners Repurchases 35.6 Mln Ordinary Shares

Stock Markets 20 minutes ago (Oct 29, 2019 10:37)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Stellar Capital Partners Repurchases 35.6 Mln Ordinary Shares Oct 24 (Reuters) - Stellar Capital Partners Ltd : * GENERAL REPURCHASE OF ORDINARY SHARES * REPURCHASED 35.6 MILLION STELLAR CAPITAL ORDINARY SHARES * REPURCHASE REPRESENTS 3.3% OF COMPANY'S ISSUED ORDINARY * COMPANY'S CASH BALANCES DECREASED BY R25.2 MILLION AS A RESULT OF GENERAL REPURCHASE

BRIEF-Stellar Capital Partners Repurchases 35.6 Mln Ordinary Shares
description: BRIEF-Stellar Capital Partners Repurchases 35.6 Mln Ordinary Shares
